name: Tarantula #18
description: The eternal optimist of the Tarantula Tribe.
backstory: With eyes that sparkle like morning dew and a smile that lights up the darkest caves, this bright-spirited tarantula transforms every web they touch into a celebration of joy. Their boundless optimism has become legendary, capable of turning even the most hardened cave dwellers into believers in the power of positive thinking. Some say their cheerful demeanor is actually their secret superpower.
